dcterms:description: The CORD-19 dataset is an aggregation of published papers and pre-prints from multiple sources, collected to promote research on COVID-19 and related coronaviruses. It contains tens of thousands of scholarly articles, some with full text, aimed at providing the global research community with a wealth of information to support the fight against COVID-19.
dcterms:title: COVID-19 Open Research Dataset (CORD-19)

dcterms:description: The WebText dataset consists of text data collected from the internet, specifically designed to train language models. It includes a diverse range of topics and styles, making it suitable for various natural language processing tasks.
dcterms:title: WebText dataset

dcterms:creator: Andrei Kutuzov
Murhaf Fares
Stephan Oepen
Erik Velldal
dcterms:description: The English Wikipedia Dump of November 2021 is a collection of articles from Wikipedia, filtered to exclude unnecessary sections. It serves as a resource for various natural language processing tasks.
dcterms:title: English Wikipedia Dump of November 2021
